Output.Description: An output signal is created when the appropriate Publishers send signals based on the *topic*.

nio/Subscriber.Description: Output signals will be created when the appropriate Publishers send signals based on the *topic*.

topic.description: Defines topic string to subscribe to in order to receive signals.

nio/Publisher.Description: Input signals will be sent to the appropriate Subscribers based on the *topic*.

Input.Description: Each input signal will be sent along to the appropriate Subscribers based on the *topic*.

topic.description: Defines topic string to use to publish signals.
